title: Self-Learning Plan for WordPress
description: This self-learning plan will guide you through the fundamentals of WordPress, from installation to content management and customization.

weeks.title: Introduction to WordPress
learningObjectives: Understand the basics of WordPress and its features
Learn how to install WordPress on a web server or hosting platform
Familiarize with the WordPress dashboard and admin interface
topicsToCover: What is WordPress and its history
Installing WordPress on a web server or hosting platform
Exploring the WordPress dashboard and admin interface
weeklyTasks: Explore the WordPress dashboard and become familiar with the admin interface
Create a basic WordPress website with a default theme

weeks.title: Content Management in WordPress
learningObjectives: Understand the difference between posts and pages in WordPress
Learn how to create, edit, and manage content using the WordPress editor
Explore the use of categories, tags, and custom taxonomies for organizing content
topicsToCover: Using the WordPress editor for content creation and formatting
Organizing content with categories, tags, and custom taxonomies
weeklyTasks: Create and publish several blog posts and pages
Experiment with different formatting options in the WordPress editor
Organize content using categories, tags, and custom taxonomies

weeks.title: Customizing the WordPress Theme
learningObjectives: Understand the concept of WordPress themes and their role in website design
Learn how to install, activate, and customize a WordPress theme
Explore the use of widgets, menus, and other theme-specific features
topicsToCover: Understanding WordPress themes and their structure
Installing and activating a WordPress theme
Customizing a WordPress theme using the Customizer and theme-specific options
Working with widgets, menus, and other theme-specific features
weeklyTasks: Install and activate a new WordPress theme
Customize the theme using the Customizer and theme-specific options
Experiment with widgets, menus, and other theme-specific features

weeks.title: WordPress Plugins and Enhancements
learningObjectives: Understand the purpose and benefits of WordPress plugins
Learn how to find, install, and activate WordPress plugins
Explore popular plugins for enhancing WordPress functionality
topicsToCover: What are WordPress plugins and their purpose
Exploring popular plugins for SEO, security, e-commerce, and more
weeklyTasks: Research and identify WordPress plugins that can enhance your website
Install and activate relevant plugins for your website needs
Configure and customize the installed plugins to fit your requirements
